comment: The only powers of an ` N ` -th root of unity that equal ` 1 ` are the multiples of ` N ` . In other words, ` -u 1 ^c ( 2 / N ) ` has order ` N ` in the multiplicative group of nonzero complex numbers. (In fact, these and their powers are the only elements of finite order in the complex numbers.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2016.)
